## AnimationClip.tracks property

All animation tracks grouped by target object.

Key: target object; Value: list of `AnimationTrack`<!-- -->s affecting that target.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get tracks(): Map<object, AnimationTrack<unknown>[]>;
```
